# Spring

## Controller

* @RequestParam
* @ModelAttribute
* @Validated
* redirect:/xx

## Model

* @NotBlank
* @NotEmpty
* @NotNull
* @Size
* @Email
* @Min
* @Max
* @Pattern
* @AssertFalse
* @AsertTrue
* @Future
* @Past
* @NumberFormat
* @DateTimeFormat

## JPA

* @GeneratedValue
  * strategy
* @OneToMany
* @ManyToOne
* @JoinColumn
